In hindsight, I really don't know what I was thinking here. Not only does this straight up lose a pawn, since one of the defenders can be traded off, but even without that being the case, I solve white's main weakness for him. Setting up the rooks to be doubled via 13...Nd5 14. Nxd5 Rxd5 seems better.
